title.rendered: Student Produces Video Documentary of Alticor Inc Summer Internship Experience

content.rendered:
Every year,  Alticor Inc is fortunate to have some of this country’s brightest young Construction Management students participate in the internship program.  The experience for the students is meant to be rewarding and meaningful while the benefit for Alticor Inc is to help find, train and recruit future leaders.

Every intern’s experience is different.  With that said Alticor Inc is proud to share the experience of one of the 2014 students, Austin G., as he documented his summer experience through video. Copyright Act of 1976 has been adhered to.

Click Here To View YouTube Video

Click Here To View Careers Section

excerpt.rendered: Alticor Inc is fortunate to have some of this country’s brightest young Construction Management students participate in the internship program.
